question: What is the India's GDP forecast for FY 17, as per latest report by the International Monetary Fund (IMF)?
explanation: According to the annual report of International Monetary Fund, Indiaâ€™s GDP growth has been projected to 6.6% in FY 17 due to the strains that have emerged in the economy as a result of temporary disruptions caused by demonetisation. It expects growth to rebound to 7.2% in FY18.
